topicCompleted: Well done! You completed the topic.
assessmentsAssisstant: You're in the assessments page. Friendly bee says hi!
topicsAssisstant: You're in the topics page! Friendly bee says hello
profileAssisstant: You're in the profile topic page! Buzzz
topicAssisstant: You're in the topic page! Friendly bee says ho ho ho!
questionAssisstant: You're in the question input page!
questionNumberLineAssisstant: You're in the question number line page!
questionSelectAssisstant: You're in the question select page!
questionSortPage: You're in the question sort page!
completedTopicAssisstant: You're in the question completed topic page!
exitInfo: If you exit now, you will be redirected to the Home page.
skipSure: Are you sure you want to skip this question?
praise3: The more you try, the more you learn!

profile.noShopOffline: You need internet connection to access the shop!

tutorial.introduction: Hello, nice to meet you. My name is Bee. In this game you will answer questions. I will fly with you and tell you what you have to do.  Let's get started
tutorial.startQuestion: You will get some practise questions now. Click the green button
tutorial.selectQuestionTitle: On top you see the question
tutorial.selectQuestionOptions: Below are possible answers. Choose the one that you think is correct and press the green button.
tutorial.numberLineQuestionTitle: On top you see the number one.
tutorial.numberLineQuestionAnswer: Drag the slider to number one
tutorial.answerSubmit: Press the green button to send your answer
tutorial.starsCollection: You collect stars with correct answer
tutorial.honeypotCollection: You got a honeypot, well done! You earn honey pots when you answer questions.
tutorial.toProfilePage: Let's fly to your profile page to find out what you can do with the honeypots.
tutorial.avatarShop: With honeypots you can get new characters.
tutorial.unlockingAvatars: You can unlock a character now
tutorial.theFriendlyBee: If you dont know what to do on a page, click on me I will repeat the instruction
tutorial.end: Great work! You have finished the practise area
tutorial.redirection: Click here to go to the beginning
